alert.note: Alert for Marion (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 3:21PM EDT until August 20 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Marion County in north central Ohio... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 320 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marion, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Morral and Green Camp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
